Legislative History of Laws

For Law 14-190, see notes following ยง 6-1031.

DC CODE ยง 6-1036

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Upon certification of the availability of funds by the Chief Financial Officer, there shall be authorized for expenditure by the Commission, $200,000 from the Industrial Revenue Bond special account. The Commission may expend other funds as appropriated.

No member of the Commission shall be reimbursed for expenses incurred in the performance of his or her duties under this subchapter nor shall any member be compensated for time expended in the performance of duties under this subchapter.

title.text: Housing and Building Restrictions and Regulations. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Housing and Community Development Reform Advisory Commission.
